Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Now a days you can't easily find a camera shop. Situated on the bottom level of Rosebank Mall near the Post Office they offer great service, are friendly and knowledgeable. They can assist with anything about cameras new and old. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I hopped on the internet looking for a FTZ Adapter and found Kameraz, I've never ordered from them before but proceeded to make the purchase. Item was delivered fast and in a mint condition, I will surely be making more purchases with them.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Hands down the best photographic shop that I have had the pleasure of doing business with.  A special thanks to Gabriel who listened to my requirements for the kind of photography I do, has a wealth of technical knowledge and made the whole process of selecting the right equipment  for my needs so easy. Thank you.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I have been a customer with Kameraz for about 5 years now. They are the best photo store in the country. Always give great prices and the best advice. Great range of gear. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Great camera store, huge variety and very knowledgeable staff, alot of used gear as well.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Excellent service from knowledgeable people at good prices. Nicely surprised to be offered a free cappuccino with my purchase (excellent). Thanks, Gareth & team!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Wow! Incredible service from Kameraz: only nine hours from placing an online order, to getting it delivered via courier to Pretoria. This was my first order with Kameraz but won‚Äôt be the last, you guys rock!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Called them they offered me a lens below market value and I got a ND filter on too of that that was so affordable, wow I'm impressed

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Bought a second hand nikon 35mm from Kameraz. It was neatly package and delivered quite fast with Dawn wing. Awesome customer service.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: We got helped immediately we entered the shop.  since I know nothing about cameras the gentleman was friendly enough to help my son pick the right one

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Excellent service & quick delivery time. The lady I spoke to on the phone was so helpful & product is in excellent used condition.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text:
Incredible service and fantastic communication!
Placed an online order and received my parcel the very next day and I was kept up to date on the status of my delivery at every step of the way.
Would highly recommend this shop for any avid photographers.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Delightful ambiance! Cute coffee shop with excellent espresso. Very good service! Sit and sip your coffee like a lady!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: One of the best camera stores I‚Äôve been to in the country. Beautiful store, I love the extended coffee shop / gallery and studio. Very unique store and is a really cool experience to go there. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I ordered a camera on Friday as I live in Cape Town, I was expecting serious delays but got it by Tuesday. I got a little card and hand sanitizer which made me like I'm not just another money-making opportunity but a valued customer üëçüëç very pleased with the service and my camera. Was like Christmas in July haha üòÇ Defs recommended.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Great prices for cameras, lenses and accessories. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They have a great selection of cameras and lenses. The store is very clean and the products are nicely packaged. The service is also great and fast.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Always a pleasure shopping here. Helpful and friendly staff

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Amazing products, very impressive setup, the exchange rate is not a nice with this place.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I was surprised they are still around. Good place for cameras and accessories.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Great  shopping  great service Knowledgeable salespeople  Honest

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Good place but couldn't find a battery for my camera. I ended up buying from TaL.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Just great service, specifically from Jean-Francen, he was both helpful and professional and went out of his way to assist. The shop itself is really well kitted out and way bigger than I assumed, with a great range of kit, well worth a visit!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: It's amazing to see how this iconic shop has evolved. I have seen it develop from being a smallish, cluttered shop, to the beautiful, well laid out and friendly store it is now. Staff are so knowledgeable and eager to engage. So many ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I was blown away by KAMERAZ ‚Äì Not only was their advise great but their price beat anyone else and I received the delivery the day after I ordered. Truly impressive !

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: The customer service is amazing. They are patient and look out for your best interest and not to make a quick buck. When there are problems with ordering they resolved it quickly with no hassles. They keep you updated on the entire process. Received my order within 2 days. I'm 1000km from them

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Saved the day for my shoot. üôèüèæ I was given a run around looking for Sony @7 batteries. I was served with a smile. üëçüèæü§òüèæ ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Lovely place, got what I needed and was done with great staff.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Very impressed with the quality of service at Kameraz! Friendly, helpful and knowledgeable staff that could answered all my questions. Highly recommended!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Hi Kameraz team, I have dealt with several people at Kameraz, mainly buying lenses-  great service and thanks for your positive attitude towards customers and photography - willing to share tips and experience!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: This is a little hidden gem at the bottom of the mall. This store is any photography enthusiast's dream. They have a variety of second hand gear that it is in a good condition and they have a phenomenal range of new gear. I love their ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: It was an experience. Getting educated while being helped immensely. Nice job..

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Love the shop good selection and good quality very friendly and helpful staff

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: The online store works! Staff are friendly and really interested in helping. Immediately after purchasing a lens, I received my courier waybill via email. Thank you.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Wow I am speechless. I received my camera within 24 hours of me placing my order. I was kept updated throughout the process as soon as something changed and I even got a handwritten note with a hand sanitizer. Kameraz outstanding service is one of a kind and they come highly recommended.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Very friendly service and wide range of products.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: While on holidays we were in need of a new camera.  The staff at Kameraz were so helpful and definitely knew their stuff about all the equipment available and their stock. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Kameraz is great! I ordered an item late on a Tuesday evening, and it was delivered to me on the Wednesday morning. Very fast delivery and friendly service. Highly recommended!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I was helped by Gabriel. I was helped immediately as I entered the store. Very unlike some of the claims in another review about not being helped due to one being of "colour". I am of colour (am Indian), and I was helped immediately. I was ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: It was great but I did not get what I went for

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Amazing place to find new and second hand cameras, equipment and lenses!! They even have a photo studio so that you can rent equipment and get your project done on time!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Awesome place to get all your camera gear. They have an excellent range of new and used gear at decent prices. Staff were friendly and helpful. They also validate parking tickets if you purchase from them. Highly recommended

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Always great product and great customer service.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Johan ..the epitome of good leadership.staff extremely knowledgeable and friendly. I cannot offer enough praise to this establishment. Stars fullhouse

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Difficult to leave without buying more than you plan. They have all the photography toys. The guys are friendly and very helpful.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: incredible service....  sent an email to them asking if they had stock of an item at 10:37am Friday...  they replied within minutes confirming that they did.. by that afternoon I already had a tracking number for the courier.. and the courier delivered to my door by the Sunday afternoon...  all this during a lock down - amazing !!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I am very pleased with kameraz. This has so vat been the best company I have dealt with in my life. They deliver on time and there service is exceptional. I had an issue with the item delivered. I emailed them and they responded within a ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Ordered a Fujifilm zoom online at 7.00am black Friday yesterday. Was delivered at 8.30 Saturday, just 24h later. Easy to use online interface, amazing service!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: One of the best if not the best camera shop in Johannesburg. They have very good second hand items as well. A great variety of products in general! Friendly stuff too. üòä‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Kameraz have a unique selection of new and used gear I can‚Äôt seem to find anywhere else. Deliver was very fast and my second hand lens was as advertised.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: An absolutely outstanding, specialist, retail outlet for all photographic equipment. Expert guidance, always helpful staff - all of whom are first rate photographers in their own right - and a splendid range of cameras, lenses and ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text:
Great assortment and availability (in my experience) compared to any camera store in Johannesburg.
Educated staff, very competitive prices, constant promotions and specials, best ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: A big store with a very wide selection of new and used camera equipment. Very knowledgeable and friendly staff are always available to help you make the right decision. Trade in a lens or camera to contribute to the price of a new item. Regular in-store specials, workshops and give-aways. Get a free parking ticket on the way out.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: It's a great one stop shop with competitive pricing. The only problem is the service! I always travel from Zim to buy gear and this is one of the shops I visit but not anymore. first visit was very pleasant, I even got a free parking pass. My other 2 visits to this shop really hurt my. (All shopper deserve to be treated the same way)

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Their staff are extremely helpful and friendly even if you don't buy anything from them.  They organized a photowalk around Rosebank and some free workshops for their 21st anniversary.  It was great fun.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: By far the best camera store around. The staff know all the answers to technical questions and solve your unsolvable tech dilemmas with their strong photographic knowledge. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I love this shop. Staff are super super knowledgable and helpful. There has never been a time where they have not known an answer to a problem. Great camera, lighting and gear store.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Firstly, this store is overpriced. Secondly, staff are very unhelpful and come across as people who have no intention of satisfying the needs/wants of their customers. My experience today was shameful and disrespectful - not going back. Not a single person of colour on the staff and I feel this affected the way I was treated.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Martin was incredibly helpful. The store is clean, the staff are friendly and the array of products will satisfy any photography enthusiast.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I bought a camera and asked for the "tax free" note, the seller gave me the wrong note and said I was doing it the right way. I recommend that you be smart if you need tax free and want to buy at this store. I asked the seller if it was ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Really fantastic service, phoning me back promptly, one on one service from Richardwhen I came through. And some little extras that really show extra care. And great advice and great pricing.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: First time ordering online from Kameraz, Go Pro Hero 8 Black. Payment went through the Pay gate system and i contacted paygate to confirm. Followed up at Kameraz but they know of nothing ... Still waiting for it to be resolved. DONT BUY ONLINE FROM THEM>

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: The guys at Kameraz are literally the bees knees. Martin is always helping me when I'm in need of an item. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I was searching the internet  for a particular Nikon lens when i came across Kameraz who had it. I contacted them and got all relevalent details from a very helpful & pleasant Martin Wright. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Great camera shop. Super helpfull and knowledgeable. Super good

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Absolutely brilliant service and went above and beyond to help. Would recommend anyone looking for something to do with photography to go there.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I popped into Kameraz to enquire about purchasing a slide viewer ... they are just about extinct.  I just wanted to compliment Kamiraze on the staff member who helped me.  He was charming, informative and very helpful.  If I purchase a new camera, which is a distinct possibility, I will definitely head for that store!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Best food fresh and clean .. waiters are down to earth..big ups to kameraz

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: KAMERAZ offers excellent customer care & photographic services, including caffe, arts/photographic galleries, passport & ID photo's, student training in photography!

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Helpful team, they provided honest and great advice. The store has a large range of various video/audio equipment.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I have worked with a lot of the big camera stores in South Africa, and this one has the best customer service by far. Make sure you ask for Wilhelmus, he really goes out of his way to make any request possible.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: If you have product questions, the staff at Kameraz responds quickly and professionally. All questions were answered, and I felt confident with product selection. I would feel very comfortable buying from this company.

Review Text:

Review Text:
Staff are friendly and helpful and knowledgeable about their products.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Wide variety of photographic equipment. Know owner very well and he is most accommodating. Couriers whatever is needed.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Incredibly helpful and patient sales people. They answered the full range of my questions, walked me through the various options and even helped me test the recommended solution out. I will certainly be returning.

Review Text:
I honestly hate this place...I really mean it!

Review Text: Great service, great prices, and also great knowledge abuout cameras, lenses, and all camera gear. I can really recommend them.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: After waiting for all eternity to get serviced I had the pleasure of dealing with indifferent and totally dismissive staff....I would advise that they get staff of colour on their payroll because those white males clearly dont know how to interact with a black female customer. Our money is the same.

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Probably the premier South African camera shop - great staff, excellent service, comprehensive stock and the largest selection of high quality second-hand equipment in the country

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: I was just wondering whether you guys have the new instax mini 11 camera. And do you accept paying in eBucks using the eBucks card?

Name: Kamerz
Review Text: Such a great store. But today i called. I explained what i needed in a camera and got told "whatever" by the guy on the phone. What unprofessionalism

Review Text: Always friendly and the best service. Can see why they are a photographer's staple in JHB.
